__e: Mrs. de Montmirail kindly did not call the police.
And the countess' bed chamber, you say, is on the first floor beyond the drawing room.
I want to know who this Comtesse is everyone keeps talking about.
It is the countess Anne told me of.
I just need to speak to the Contessa for a moment, Bill, about a murder.
You cannot mean her ladyship, the Dowager Countess. Not if you wish to remain in this house.
We'd all better come work at the Dower House.
Ooh, it doesn't look as if she'll be staying on at the Dower House.
I told them the countess had sent me for a dress.
The Countess told me she made a mistake, and I was the one.
The countess told me I was like a daughter to her.
You will have your chance tonight to find out if the Countess is the same witch you fought all those years ago.
The Countess is here and you didn't tell me anything.
And thanks on behalf of all.
